name: Mysterious Dark Cube
description:
Mysterious Dark Cube is a sokoban inspired game with a dark atmosphere and a twist. The whole game is played in a cube, each time you complete a puzzle, everything in the environment changes to reveal the next puzzle.

8 levels available.

A game for the Godot Fire Jam 1. Hosted by BackAt50Ft .

Poem by  BackAt50Ft.

It is recommended to download and play the Windows version for a better experience. The web version is missing some graphical effects for better performance.
